topic_description: Art and Design encompasses creative practices that combine aesthetic principles with functional requirements. This field explores various mediums including digital art, graphic design, user interface design, and creative expression through technology. Researchers investigate how computational methods, AI, and emerging technologies can enhance creative processes, democratize design tools, and push the boundaries of artistic expression while addressing challenges in creativity, originality, and human-AI collaboration.
